# cellularServices

**Instance Property**

An array of cellular services available on the system.

## Declaration

```swift
final var cellularServices: [CellularServiceState] { get throws }
```

## Discussion

To receive notification of changes to the available services, monitor the [doc://com.apple.availability/documentation/TelephonyMessagingKit/TelephonyMessagingSession/cellularServiceStateUpdates] property.

## Determining service availability

- **cellularServiceStateUpdates**: An asynchronous sequence of cellular service state updates produced by this session.
- **CellularServiceState**: A structure that contains information about a cellular service.
